messages.subject: Project Update
messages.body: Hi there! I wanted to give you an update on the current project status. We are making good progress and should be on track for the deadline.

messages.subject: Meeting Tomorrow
messages.body: Don't forget about our meeting tomorrow at 2 PM. We'll be discussing the quarterly results and planning for next quarter.

messages.subject: System Maintenance
messages.body: We will be performing system maintenance this weekend. Please save your work and log out by Friday evening.

messages.subject: Welcome to the Team!
messages.body: Welcome aboard! We are excited to have you join our team. Please let me know if you have any questions as you get started.

messages.subject: Q4 Campaign Results
messages.body: Here are the final results from our Q4 marketing campaign. Overall performance exceeded expectations with a 15% increase in conversions.

messages.subject: Benefits Enrollment Reminder
messages.body: This is a friendly reminder that benefits enrollment closes this Friday. Please make sure to review and submit your selections before the deadline.

messages.subject: Code Review Request
messages.body: Could you please review the pull request I submitted for the authentication module? I've implemented the changes we discussed in last week's meeting.

messages.subject: Expense Report Due
messages.body: Your monthly expense report is due by end of day tomorrow. Please submit all receipts and documentation through the finance portal.
